timelines.title: Life Choice
timelines.description: I started at Life Choices Academy. I'm doing a Full Stack development course

timelines.title: Stodels Garden centre
timelines.description: I started working at Stodels in 2021 as a general assistant and sales consultant. In the year 2022 i got promoted to a drivers position where I was responsible for doing deliveries for the company as well transporting staff from branch to branch.

timelines.title: Sarepta Secondary  School
timelines.description: I graduated in 2020 with a bachelor degree.

testimonials.title: Colleague
testimonials.name: Luke Evertson
testimonials.description: Antonio is a very fun person to work with and has a great sense of humour.He Is hardworking and disciplined and could be a role model for many. I always love working with him cause he always see the biggger picture.

testimonials.title: Colleague
testimonials.name: Asiphe Ndimlana
testimonials.description: Antonio is very independent. Whenever he struggles with something he would rather first try and figure it out himself before asking for help. He is extremely kind and friendly and turns every person he meets for the first time into his friend.

testimonials.title: Colleague
testimonials.name: Taahirah Ismail
testimonials.description: He may be a man of few words, but Antonio's hard work and dedication always shine through in whatever he does. You can easily tell he appreciates every opportunity he is given and takes nothing for granted.

testimonials.title: Colleague
testimonials.name: Ethan Oliver
testimonials.description: I am thrilled to share my positive testimonial about my experience with Antonio. From the moment I first met him I was impressed. His dedication to excellence and drive to achieve was evident in every interaction I had with him.

testimonials.title: Colleague
testimonials.name: Deno Rautenbach
testimonials.description: Antonio is a very hardworking individual.He has improved a lot in both his coding aswell as in his problem solving skills. He is an extremely nice person to work with as he is very friendly

testimonials.title: Intern
testimonials.name: Maxwill Isaacs
testimonials.description: Antonio is an exceptionally hard worker and always making time to assist anyone who is in need. Also goes the extra-mile when doing anything that has to be done. He is also very confident in his capabilities and never fails to get the Job done.
